title: BROKIG Mens Lightweight Gym Jogger Pants,Men's Workout Sweatpants with Zip Pocket
description: Swanky Appearance: Athletic fit tapered gym joggers with skin-friendly surface; regular thighs and snug fit legs without friction and irritation; tips: They are slim fit design; one size up when you prefer loose fit
Updated Reliable Fabric: Stretchy and lightweight men's casual sport sweatpants strengthened crotch stitching with no worry of tearing when running or riding
Practical Zipper Pocket: Right side extra hidden zipper pocket to carry your valuable accessories like phone or wallet when on the go
Versatile Occasions for Wearing: These tapered workout pants for men are perfect for jogging, running, exercise, athletic, track, fitness, or cycling, and also for daily casual wear
Size Chart: S(Waist 26-30"), M(Waist 28-32"), L(Waist 31-35"), XL(Waist 34-37"), XXL(Waist 36-103"); tips: They are slim fit design; one size up when you prefer loose fit
